sourcesContent:
About Me

Hey there! I'm Xuan Yi, and I'm excited to share a bit about what I’m working on. Currently, I’m developing an anime streaming website where fans can discover and enjoy their favorite shows. Alongside that, I’ve completed a bus app designed to track bus arrival timings and make public transportation more efficient.

When I’m not immersed in coding, you’ll find me indulging in my love for music and games. I’m a vinyl aficionado and cassette collector, always on the lookout for fantastic audio gear like headphones and speakers. My passion for music is matched by my enthusiasm for board games—strategizing with friends and discovering new games is one of my favorite pastimes.

Welcome to my corner of the web, where I blend my interests and projects. Feel free to reach out if you share my passions or just want to chat!

My Resume

You may view my resume by downloading it here!

What I'm Doing Now

  • Interning at Continental Automotives Singapore as a software engineer
  • Building a video streaming website using the PERN Stack
